Defined class WriteTemplate with attribute(s) and method(s). Created API for write operation of template content.
class dist_py_module.pro.write_template.WriteTemplate(verbose=False)[source]¶

Bases: ats_utilities.config_io.base_check.FileChecking

Defined class WriteTemplate with attribute(s) and method(s). Created API for write operation of template content. It defines:

attributes:
GEN_VERBOSE - console text indicator for process-phase.
__setup - setup files.
methods:
__init__ - initial constructor.
get_setup - getter for setup files.
write - write a template content to a setup files.
__str__ - dunder method for WriteTemplate.
GEN_VERBOSE = 'DIST_PY_modules::PRO::WRITE_TEMPLATE'¶
VERBOSE = 'ATS_UTILITIES'¶
get_setup()[source]¶

Getter for setup file object.

Returns:setup file path | None.
Return type:<str> | <NoneType>
write(setup_content, package_name, modules, verbose=False)[source]¶

Write setup content to file.

Parameters:
  • setup_content (<dict>) – parameter template content.
  • package_name (<str>) – parameter package name.
  • modules (<str>) – modules.
  • verbose (<bool>) – enable/disable verbose option.
Returns:

boolean status, True (success) | False.
Return type:

<bool>
Exception:

ATSTypeError | ATSBadCallError
